title: Navigation Group Entity
description: This document defines navigation group entity

id.description: A unique identifier for the navigation group

internal name.description: Internal instance name for the navigation group

isHeader.description: Specifies if the group should display a header

isCollabsible.description: Specifies if the group can be collapsed

isCollapsed.description: Specifies if the group in collapsed position

row.description: The row number postion of the group

column.description: The column number postion of the group

menuItems.description: An array of menu items included in the group

enabled.description: Specifies if the group is enabled
